statements: DELETE FROM tallies WHERE candidate_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM tallies WHERE candidate_name = 'Alice' AND vote_count > 100;
DELETE FROM tallies WHERE vote_count <= 50 AND candidate_name = 'Bob';
DELETE FROM candidates WHERE candidate_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM voters WHERE voter_id = 100 AND voted_candidate_id = 1;
DELETE FROM voters WHERE voted_candidate_id = (SELECT candidate_id FROM candidates WHERE candidate_name = 'John Doe')
DELETE FROM votes WHERE voter_id = 1 AND candidate_id = 3;
